block.p: Podcast: Scheduled to appear this week are Darcey Steinke, the author of ''Easter Everywhere''; Jennifer Senior on Dorothy Schiff (above) and The New York Post; Tobin Harshaw on ''The Last Mughal,'' by William Dalrymple; and Dwight Garner, senior editor, with best-seller news. Sam Tanenhaus, the editor of the Book Review, is the host.
First Chapters: Excerpts from ''Black & White,'' by Dani Shapiro; ''Ant Farm,'' by Simon Rich; and other books.
Search: A free archive of book reviews since 1981.
Books Update E-Mail: Receive a selective overview of new book reviews and features every Sunday.
